title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.2: STRENGTHENING SOCIAL SERVICE SYSTEMS

description.narrative: Output 4.2: By 2026, All children, including adolescents, have increased equitable access to a strengthened and responsive social service system, including in climate-affected locations and other humanitarian settings, which contributes to Prevention Of Harmful Practice, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice (Covid), Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 4 - Child Protection: By 2026, all children, including adolescents, are better protected from all forms of violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect and harmful traditional practices

participating-org.narrative: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES MOSW CSPB
DIVISIONAL OFFICE DEPT OF SOCIAL SERVICES MYMENSINGH

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
